name: Solar Survivor
description:
Solar Survivor is a fast-paced space action game with bullet-hell / roguelite / survivor type elements. Fight wave after wave of enemies in Space.

Use gravity and planets to your advantage! 

TIP: Circle the planets to activate the Planet ability! It'll be worth it promise :-)

Choose your upgrades and powerups wisely and become all-powerful and unstoppable!

Use Arrow Keys (Up/Left/Right) or W/A/D to move.

Press SPACE to cycle through Planet Action or use Q/E/F/C/X to switch directly.

TIP: Circle the planets to activate the Planet ability! It'll be worth it promise :-)

Youtube: http://youtu.be/p2UxTqD0dDA
